item.title: Calling Go funcs from asm and JITed code
item.description: Original (ru): https://habr.com/ru/post/489482/. Intro As long as your assembler code does something simple, you’re golden. As soon as you’ll need to call a Go function from it, the first suggestion that you’ll probably get: don’t do it. Perhaps you would like to follow that advice, especially if you’re unsure why you needed it in the first place. But what if you can’t avoid that? Read-on, we have a cure.
